title: Transcendence Through Hypnotic Crisis / A Guide to Liberation with Dr. Marco Paret's students
description:
Dr. Marco Paret's students demonstrate activation of the parasympathetic system, animal magnetism and mesmeric crisis on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. Dr. Paret helped thousands of students to solve their problems becoming professional and getting success. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
 https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolinguistic  

Join our Italian channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching  

For any further information, please contact us at:
